## Summary
Provide a concise description of the requested feature or change.

## Motivation / problem
- Which problem does this feature solve?
- Which users or workflows benefit from this?

## Proposal
- Concrete description of the functionality
- UI/UX suggestions (if relevant)
- API/CLI changes (if relevant)
- Example workflow or pseudocode

## Acceptance criteria
- What conditions must be met to consider this feature implemented?
  - Criterion 1
  - Criterion 2

## Implementation ideas &amp; risks
- Short technical plan: which crate(s) or modules would change
- Potential performance/security impacts

## Priority
- Nice-to-have / High value / Required for X

## Additional notes
- Links to related projects, design notes or mockups
